title: So, the enemy Jungler is "literally" sitting in your top lane brush camping you all game...
body:
And you say it's your idiot jungler's fault for not coming to help?

Let's do something we don't normally do, and think for a moment. The negatives of this situation are obvious:

1. You are forced back to tower, let's hope you've practiced farming under turret!
2. If you leave lane without TP, you risk losing tower.
3. Uh....

But what about the positives? Let's explore:

1. The enemy jungle and top lane are splitting a lot of XP, so they will both be behind in levels at some point.
2. The enemy jungler is not farming as much as they should, and their jungle is left unguarded.
3. Your other lanes don't have any pressure on them from the jungle, so they can focus on winning their lanes and nothing else.
4. Your jungler is free to gank without worry of counterganking.
5. Free dragon!

So basically, the enemy jungler, when they do this, is handing you a free win, and all you have to do is play like a bitch.

But you can't play like a bitch, can you? That's not what an alpha male does, is it? Nah you gotta put that pussy enemy top laner in his place for needing jungle help all game, so you take a 1v2 in the middle of a huge enemy minion wave, not twice, but three times, the whole time spam pinging your jungler and screaming about how he's not helping you blah blah blah.

Seriously, play like a bitch, waste as much of their time as you can without giving up a kill, and enjoy your free win.

That'd be great if my jungle didn't spend the whole time pathing through only their jungle, not applying pressure to the other lanes, and not grabbing drag. I know it opens up a lot of positive options for our team (or more specifically, our jungler), but they have to actually take advantage of those options.

I don't top lane often, but when I do (or I see this happening to our top laner), I don't complain about the camp but I will/do complain about the lack of pressure which tends to be more infuriating to me.

I'm just playing devil's advocate though, pointing out how it's not always happy sunshine time if this happens.

If you notice this and your jungle doesn't, then you can type something like

But it's ok. All you have to do to avoid dying is ward right? When you get chunked for half your hp by a jungler you didn't feed for going to ward your tri-brush or river brush... only to have their jungler place control ward or sweeper and clear it. And their toplaner uses another control ward so you basically can't leave your tower and must assume that - like the past 8 min of the game (from 2:50 mark) the enemy jungler is either in toplane or just a jungle camp away from toplane.

Pointing it out doesn't mean they are going to suddenly do something. Plus it's like saying "Hey, I realize they picked this champ, and x hard counters it". Knowing the right thing, and knowing how to DO the right thing aren't one in the same.

Most people "know" what to do, they just have no clue how to do it. My jungler knows he should be ganking, but he will just walk into lane half assed and try to force a dive and have no idea why it failed.

That feeling when you ping the river is warded, and your jungler could walk through lane to gank - using the unwarded lane brush... but walks through river and sees the enemy walk away. They either flash and dash to catch the enemy only to have them get away without having to even flash, or they just walk away. Or when you could tower dive with a giant minion wave in like 4 sec, but your jungler decides to not wait 4 sec for easy 2v1 dive, but instead flash engages 1v1 while tanking free tower shots and dies. Stupid toplaner doesn't follow up. Right... let me just cross half a lane in 1.5 sec, blow my flash, and get within 2 aa's from dead so we can tower dive and kill the guy 4 sec sooner. That way when the camping enemy toplaner - who's left lane for a whole 20 sec for the first time all game - comes back, he can 1v2 kills us both. Or... you could do things my way, and we'll be high enough hp he can't 1v2 us even under his tower... meaning we either zone him away and take tower after killing his toplaner or we kill them both and take tower. Now, which option are you going to ta... option 1. Dammit.
And even when he does only farm his jungle he gets more and more ahead.

maybe in the small picture when only comparing the 2 junglers, but at the same time your top is being put behind which will balance it out when looking at the team as a whole. As someone else pointed out, "just farm under tower" is quite a poor argument because a decent laner will freeze on you. Top is being denied waves upon waves of gold, as well as experience if they're especially unlucky.

This is assuming that mid and bot are both going even. If even one of those lanes are behind while the other is even then the enemy jungle has therefor been more productive on a team-wide outlook because you as a jungler have been completely neutral and unhelpful.

So when you say a decent laner will freeze then why argue that your jungler will do nothing? A decent jungler will farm and pressure somewhere else while a good jungler will farm counter jungle and pressure somewhere. Seeing it your way is so one dimensional.

Because freezing a lane is a much more common/generic/vital skill for all laners than abusing the whole jungle and maximizing path efficiency is for junglers.
